name: Ninja Ponk
description:
★★Join The Millions of Ninja Ponk Players!★★


If you want to become a Ninja Master you must have one crucial skill.... Bouncing!

In the tough life of a Ninja full of spying, sabotage and infiltration there is always something to jump over. You have to stay focused and concentrated!


★ HIGHLIGHTS ★

✔ 6 beautiful, detailed lands where you can enjoy the pure pleasure of bouncing
✔ Extremely simple but insanely addictive MOVE & BOUNCE gameplay!
✔ Tiny Ninjas
✔ Awesome bonuses
✔ Arcade & Endless gameplay modes
✔ A lot of additional, unlockable content and gameplay modifications
✔ Gorgeous HD Retina graphics - looks dead good on iPhone 4S/4
✔ Game Center with 33 tricky achievements and 7 different leaderboards
✔ Facebook & Twitter integrations – show high scores to your friends
✔ Supports all Devices!

★ FREE Updates Coming Soon! ★
More LANDS
More UNLOCKABLE CONTENT
More cool FEATURES



Find out more!

Follow us: www.twitter.com/alienwormgames
Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/user/AlienWormGames
More information: http://www.alienworm.com


☯ Please don't bounce ninjas and drive - Ninja Ponk is extremely addictive!
